explanation: The report is correct. In the configuration described (MHD_ASAN_POISON_ACTIVE defined while neither HAVE___ASAN_REGION_IS_POISONED nor HAVE___ASAN_ADDRESS_IS_POISONED are defined), the code sets need_red_zone_before = true unconditionally. The later controlling expression if (need_red_zone_before) therefore always evaluates to true in that translation unit/build, i.e. is invariant. This is not one of the allowed exceptions to MISRA C 2023 Rule 14.3 (it is not an intentional infinite loop nor the permitted do-while case), so the code violates Rule 14.3 in that configuration.
